scripts.preinstall:
echo 'Machine global peer dependency "nodegit" is required. Checking for libgit2...
'; if ! [ $(id -u) = 0 ]; then echo "Must be root to run script" && exit 1; fi; DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive sudo apt-get install -yqq libgit2-27 openssl && sudo apt -y autoremove # libssl-dev libssh2-1-dev  libffi-dev  zlib1g-dev python-cffi python-dev  python-pip build-essential cmake  gcc  pkg-config  git libhttp-parser-dev python-setuptools wget # https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37634883/installing-libgit2-and-pygit2-on-debian-docker
